text: Pas, cun [hamsari Aziz] najrang [-u ʙadgui]-i ononro sunid, [saxsero ʙaroi da'vat] ʙa suroƣason firistod va maclise ʙarojason tartiʙ dod va ʙa har kadom [ʙaroi ʙuridani ƣizo] korde dod va ʙa Jusuf guft: «Bar [cam'i] onon vorid sav». Pas, [zanon] cun uro didand, ʙisjor ʙuzurg [-u zeʙo] sumurdand va [cunon mahvi camolas sudand] dasthojasonro zaxmi kardand va guftand: «Panoh ʙar Alloh taolo! In ʙasar nest, in cuz faristae ʙuzurgvor nest»
